Package org.mockito.runners

JUnit runners.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConsoleSpammingMockitoJUnitRunner Uses JUnit 4.5 runner BlockJUnit4ClassRunner.
MockitoJUnit44Runner Deprecated.
MockitoJUnitRunner Compatible with JUnit 4.4 and higher, this runner adds following behavior: Initializes mocks annotated with Mock, so that explicit usage of MockitoAnnotations.initMocks(Object) is not necessary.
VerboseMockitoJUnitRunner Experimental implementation that suppose to improve tdd/testing experience.

JUnit runners.
